Setting time Pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time.B. Winding the watch Push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation with 30-40 turns. The power will be full(Over winding will ultimately break the spring). Do this one time each day (before sleeping). Otherwise, it will stop working.
